nodes.text: The KD-36 Bioweapon Dispersal Drone was a model of probe droid that was used by the freelance spy known as the Shroud. It was designed to deploy poisonous gases and bioweapons, and KD-36 drones were deployed to eliminate individuals who were intruding on the Shroud's business.

KD-36 Bioweapon Dispersal Drones appear as enemies in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel, the first Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. The KD-36 attacks players who use macrobinoculars to scan the Shroud's transmitters on Hoth, Tatooine, and Voss.
